data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

This ____ usually ____ achieved ____ possessing ____ elements ____ friendship, by ____ kind, generous, loyal, honest ____ by ____ fun. With ____ qualities ____ can ____ enjoy ____ bliss ____ friendship. There are expectations, demands and complaints in friendship too.

This c__ usually b_ achieved b_ possessing t__ elements o_ friendship, by be___ kind, generous, loyal, honest a__ by hav___ fun. With th___ qualities y__ can tr___ enjoy t__ bliss o_ friendship. data.fullContent: The strength of the bond of friendship between two people can vary. If the bond is very strong, they are called best friends. This can usually be achieved by possessing the elements of friendship, by being kind, generous, loyal, honest and by having fun. With these qualities you can truly enjoy the bliss of friendship. There are expectations, demands and complaints in friendship too.
data.answer: 两个人之间友谊的强度是不同的。如果这种关系非常强，他们就被称为最好的朋友。这通常可以通过拥有友谊的元素来实现，通过友善、慷慨、忠诚、诚实和玩乐。有了这些品质，你就能真正享受到友谊的幸福。友谊中也有期望、要求和抱怨。
